attributes.action: Scrap the dangerous dogs act in favour of training with a qualified trainer and an anual refresher course, and educating people on what to do when approached by a dog.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of peole every year are injured in attacks by dogs. But the dogs are not the ones at fault here, we are. It is humans that are to blame for this because we are the ones responsible for bringing them into our lives and domesticating them. If a person is knocked down on the road, do we blame the car? If you walk along in icey conditions and you slip and fall, do you blame the weather, or the council for failing to grit the ground?
